channel.title: IDMMac Updates
channel.description: Most recent updates for IDMMac - Fast, lightweight macOS download manager

item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description:
What's New in IDMMac 0.1.1

  • ✨ Added "Re-Download File" feature for completed downloads - perfect for corrupted or damaged files
  • 🔄 Added retry functionality for failed downloads with one-click re-download option
  • 🎯 Fixed Progress column header alignment in the downloads list
  • 💡 Improved user experience with clear action buttons and context menus

item.title: Version 0.1.0
item.description:
What's New in IDMMac 0.1.0

  • 🚀 Initial release
  • ⚡ Segmented multi-connection downloads for maximum speed
  • ⏸️ Pause, resume, and cancel downloads
  • ✅ SHA-256 file integrity verification
  • 📊 Real-time speed, ETA, and progress tracking
  • 🔄 Auto-reconnect on network issues
  • 🌐 Chrome & Firefox extension integration
  • 📥 YouTube video download support (via yt-dlp)
  • ⏰ Schedule downloads for later
  • 🔔 Download completion notifications
  • 🔐 Automatic updates with Sparkle 2

System Requirements

  • macOS 13.0 (Ventura) or later
  • Apple Silicon or Intel processor
